name: The Stanley Parable: Raphael Parable
summary:
The Raphael Parable is a community-made modification for The Stanley Parable, being the most popular mod created for the game along with Experiment 427 and the Escape Pod Ending Overwrite Mod.
The Raphael Parable expands the Office to contain several new areas, new visual assets such as furniture, and new Narrator dialogue. Unlike the main game, The Raphael Parable only contains two endings.
